Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory731.jpg'}
{3: '4:00 PM, Refugee Camp'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: "What's your name again, little one?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'My name is Elene, Sir.'}
{2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: 'Oh, right, I knew it started with an E.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "Yeah, it's Elene."}
{2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: 'Oh, Merlin!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "It's Elene, Sir. The Merlin you're talking about isn't in this camp."}
{2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: 'Hmm, not Merlin, huh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: "So what's your name again?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elene', 3: "Sir, it's time to take your medicine.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lamia forcefully feeds the liquid medicine to the old man by holding the bowl up to his mouth.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Why must I be the one to do this...?)', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As she slowly feeds the somewhat senile old man the suspiciously flavored medicine, Lamia begins to reflect on her actions for a rare moment.'}
{3: 'Ever since accepting Luna\'s "gift," she had shed her usual lethargy and begun to earnestly investigate the suspicious locations.'}

{3: 'She had visited laboratories long abandoned, Hetero Zones that spread to new realms, the seabed that gathered tens of thousands of Corrupted, and even witnessed low-flying white drones soaring by, narrowly avoiding colliding with one.'}
{3: "However, she didn't find what Luna needed in these places, and after the excitement of regaining her legs wore off, she became quite worried."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(If this continues... I'll be killed...)"}
{3: "Recalling the white-haired Ascendant she came across in some ruins and the warning gaze she had sent her way before speeding away on her red motorbike, Lamia can't help but tremble."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(If I can't produce results as soon as I can, none of my feeble explanations will ever convince Alpha.)"}
{2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: 'Why are you trembling, young Elene? Are you cold?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "I've told you a thousand times my name is E—huh? Wait, you remember my name now?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: 'Ah... yes, yes. Elene, right? I remember it, of course.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kind Old Man', 3: 'The last one was Merlin, the one before was Ruolin. I remember, I remember... hmm, what do I remember again?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing that the old man has started to ramble like always, Lamia, used to it by now, leaves him to his devices and focuses on cleaning up the now-empty medicine bowl.'}
{3: 'Lamia learned of this place from the memory shell of a Corrupted. She knows that outsiders of this camp are sent to some secret location periodically.'}
{3: 'And this place just might have the clues she needs—it could be an experimental site or even a secret base of the Ascendants.'}
{3: "Mankind's madness has surpassed her imagination, and Kurono might be among the most fanatical of them all."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(The transport vehicle seems to be running a bit late this time, no?)', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Having made up her mind to uncover the secret location, Lamia disguises herself as a child and blends into the refugee camp.'}
{3: 'To come across as even less intimidating, Lamia turns herself into a little girl who, having lost her legs, is trying to survive this apocalyptic land with her prosthetics.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(This is one hell of a childhood drama. I've got to make this count.)", 4: '18'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg'}
{3: "Lamia curses the tardy transport driver under her breath as she carries empty bowls toward the tent's exit."}

{3: "Just as Lamia uses her harmless appearance to deceive the camp's residents, this senile old man, unbeknownst to himself, is used by the camp's behind-the-scenes manipulators to lower newcomers' guards."}
{3: 'This facade of kindness is the best disguise for malice—a lesson Lamia has learned and exploited many times over.'}
{3: 'After returning the medicine bowls to their place, Lamia intends to maintain her current persona and heads to her usual rock to daydream.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: 'Hey, fancy seeing you here, Elene.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'A seemingly friendly guard stops her. These guards are the only people in the camp openly armed.'}
{3: 'Although Lamia knows only too well that almost every native living at the camp has a weapon hidden under their pillow.'}
{3: 'This guard is usually seen hanging out with his drunk friends—today, however, he has someone with bandages wrapped around their face in tow.'}
{3: "A worn windbreaker paired with clothes patched beyond recognition and boots filled with sand and cracked open, this stranger's attire is common among refugees here."}
{3: "The stranger's face is completely covered in bandages, with only a pair of lifeless eyes still taking in the world around."}
{3: 'In between the bandages, Lamia can vaguely make out traces of severe burns. An unpleasant smell seems to waft through the slits.'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "This one has just fled from another camp. And their face... well, it's a long story.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The guard shakes his head, looking somewhat sorry.'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "Ain't something you'd want to know. It's a real source of nightmares, I can tell ya.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "Show this new friend around, Elene, and take them to the resting area when you're done.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(A new victim? Oh well, none of my business.)', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Lamia is completely uninterested but has no choice but to say yes.'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "Look, it's nothing personal that we had to take your weapon away from you. We can't make exceptions when everyone else has to hand over their weapons here.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The person wrapped in bandages nods as the guard speaks to them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Just giving away the weapon like that, huh... Talk about being dumb.)', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Then, the person in bandages opens their mouth to speak.'}
{2: "Don't worry. I understand that you were just doing your job.", 3: '87'}
{3: 'In disguise, the person sounds raspy and weak—betraying not one bit of their naturally resonant voice.'}
{3: 'But it takes Lamia, a master of disguise herself, only a split second to know who this person is.'}
{3: 'Awash in unpleasant memories, Lamia starts looking around reflexively out of a survival instinct.'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "Elene, lookin' for somethin'?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Not really...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Fortunately, she doesn't see a certain red figure with a katana, nor a pink-haired Construct, or a young man carrying a sniper rifle over on the distant hill."}
{3: "But most importantly, she doesn't see a red-haired madwoman with a Banner Spear and a crazed smile hiding anywhere—and with it, she lets out a sigh of relief."}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "The person's all yours. I'm still on patrol.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Right... of course...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lamia doesn't want to have anything to do with this person, but refusing the guard's request outright is only going to raise suspicion."}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Please, this way.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Despite her confidence in her disguise, Lamia finds it increasingly difficult to meet this person's eyes when she knows who they are."}
{3: 'Behind those feigned weary eyes seems to be a soul scrutinizing everything from the shadows, making Lamia feel absolutely naked.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory280.png'}
{3: "The monster she once feared so much and believed to be invincible has fallen at Luna's hands—and it's this very commandant who had awakened Luna."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory399.jpg'}
{3: 'She once mustered the courage to confront people head-on—only to be utterly defeated, and this commandant was there, too.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'To begin with, Lamia has never been brave. To her, this commandant has become something of a symbol—or, to put it simply...'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Something bad happens every time we cross paths...)', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Although Lamia knows that this is just some sort of superstition—or, rather, an excuse she comes up with to cover her failures.'}
{2: 'Uh-hum, excuse me...', 3: '122'}
{3: 'Engrossed in her little internal drama, Lamia jolts at the sudden cough, letting out her usual shriek.'}
{2: "Sorry, didn't mean to scare you...", 3: '126'}
{3: 'Before her, the human maintains their raspy voice as they try to calm Lamia with a gentle tone.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(Didn't lose any cool there? That's some tough acting right there...)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Wait, why am I so scared anyway?)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(The Gray Ravens aren't here, and that red-haired crazy woman isn't here. All I've got to deal with here is a weak human being without any weapon.)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Which means I can just do whatever I want, right?!)', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia sneaks a glance at the human before her.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(Given this one's reputation, I bet Luna is going to be on cloud nine if I take this human to her.)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(Hmm... but she doesn't seem to care much about humans. Maybe this person isn't as important as I thought?)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(...Guess it'd be nothing but trouble trying to capture this human. I should probably do as told first.)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia gives up on the idea of kidnapping the human after picturing herself being chased and cornered.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(But what is this human doing here? Are they here trying to do what I'm trying to do? Guess this is my chance to learn a few things about Babylonia.)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(Except it's probably not going to be that easy... so I guess I should just try to be safe rather than sorry.)", 4: '1'}

{3: "As much as Lamia hates the idea of having to do with the human, she can't help but want to do better so she can leave Luna with a better impression. She finds herself torn between these conflicting thoughts."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(But they don't know who I am yet, which means it won't hurt to have a conversation to dig out a few things.)", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "In the end, the thought of wanting to impress wins over. Compared to Alpha's katana, striking up a conversation with this human hardly seems daunting."}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Uhm... I was wondering if...', 4: '1'}
{3: "The human gazes into Lamia's eyes."}
{2: 'Elene', 3: '...Uhm, never mind... Here, please come this way...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With those eyes staring back at her, Lamia lowers her head despite herself as she leads the human toward the resting area.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Why do they need to look people in the eye when they talk?!)', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(I swear I'm so going to be ready to get some info out of this person tomorrow.)", 4: '18'}
{3: 'Lamia quietly cheers herself on.'}
